FuncDef: The display atm pvp-info command displays PVP configuration.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a VPI.
The PVP identified by vpiValue must have been created.
The value is an integer, and its range varies with the interface type.
UNI interface: The value ranges from 0 to 255.NNI interface: The value ranges from 0 to 4095.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If a PVP has been configured on an interface enabled with ATM cell relay, run the display atm pvp-info command to view the configuration and statistics about the PVP. When you use the display atm pvp-info command, note the following:
If you do not specify any parameter, the command displays information about all PVPs on all ATM interfaces.If you specify interface, the command displays information about all PVPs on the specified interface.

Prerequisites
ATM PVP configurations have been complete.
